org.middleheaven.notification.jms
Class JMSSenderAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.notification.jms.JMSSenderAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
BroadcastAdapter, NotificationBroadcastIntercepter
public class JMSSenderAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BroadcastAdapter, NotificationBroadcastIntercepter

Add an intercepter that captures RemoteNotification and sends then as a JMS message to specified MessageProducer
